ray.rage.scene

Interface ManualObjectSection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Disposable, Renderable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericManualObjectSection

    public interface ManualObjectSection
extends Renderable
    A manual object section is a renderable part of a manual-object.

    Only a renderable section like this one gets submitted by the scene-manager to the render-system for processing.

    There's a 1:M relationship between manual-object and sections. A section must be owned by only one manual-object. It's the manual-object's responsibility to dispose of its sections.

    Author:
    Raymond L. Rivera
    See Also:
    ManualObject
